title: Visual pose is wrongly described in documentation

content.raw:
```
<visual>
	<pose>
	Description: Origin of the visual relative to its parent.
```

While in all other <pose> attributes the description states exactly where the origin is related to, in the <visual> one might (wrongly) assume that the <pose> is relative to the parent link associated by a joint <parrent> <child> relationship. 

It should change to

```
The reference frame of the visual element, relative to the reference frame of the link.
```
content.html:
<visual>
    <pose>
    Description: Origin of the visual relative to its parent.

While in all other <pose> attributes the description states exactly where the origin is related to, in the <visual> one might (wrongly) assume that the <pose> is relative to the parent link associated by a joint <parrent> <child> relationship.

It should change to

The reference frame of the visual element, relative to the reference frame of the link.
